H0.text: To what RAF base, near Wooton Bassett village, were the bodies of servicemen killed in Afghanistan formerly transported. Brize Norton

H1.text: To what RAF base, near Wooton Bassett village, were the bodies of servicemen killed in Afghanistan formerly transported. Fairford

H2.text: To what RAF base, near Wooton Bassett village, were the bodies of servicemen killed in Afghanistan formerly transported. Benson

H3.text: To what RAF base, near Wooton Bassett village, were the bodies of servicemen killed in Afghanistan formerly transported. LYNEHAM

A4.text: The station was also where repatriation of British personnel killed in Iraq and Afghanistan took place.
